answers.answer: I've had preeclampsia with both of my pregnancies. It never went away and was monitored weekly once it started. My 1st was born at 34 weeks...but it was due to my waters breaking. My 2nd was induced at 37 weeks due to the preeclampsia. I'm 27 weeks now and not showing any signs of it...knock on wood!
The cure for true preeclampsia is delivery of the fetus as it, by definition,  if a disease process caused by pregnancy. If it is true preeclampsia then it will not just subside.
Preeclampsia is pregnancy induced hypertension. Hopefully ur doctor would be able to control ur hypertension until ur baby is term, earliest of 37wks.
Thanks guys I got my labs back and they are all within normal limits just need to watch my salt intake

question: Has anyone experienced preeclampsia? did it subside? I'm 31weeks and I'm hoping I won't have to deliver any earlier than my edd...help!!!
title: nervous!
